Paragraph: Based on an empirical formula , the corresponding HOMO and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels ( E HOMO and E LUMO ) of PBDT-TDPP-S were calculated to be -5.34 and -3.52 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| --- |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Based on an empirical formula , the corresponding HOMO and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels ( E HOMO and E LUMO ) of PBDT-TDPP-S were calculated to be -5.34 and -3.52 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| E HOMO |
| E LUMO |

These are the two "Property Name" entities found in the paragraph. They are mentioned as E HOMO and E LUMO, which represent the energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital, respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| E HOMO |
| E LUMO |

The entities E HOMO and E LUMO are the only clear "Material Property" entities in the paragraph. They represent the energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital, respectively. The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "empirical formula" and "PBDT-TDPP-S," do not clearly refer to material properties and have not been included in the table.
